heading: Asɔre mpanimfoɔ de wɔn nsa gu tiri so hyɛ asɔfoɔ ne akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ. Bɛyɛ mfinhyia 401–421 wɔ Kristo awoɔ akyiri.

verses.txt: Ɛkwan a akyidifoɔ no a na wɔfrɛ wɔn asɔre mpanimfoɔ no faa so hyɛɛ asɔfoɔ ne akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ—
Mmerɛ a wɔbɔɔ mpaeɛ kyerɛɛ Agya no wɔ Kristo din mu wieeɛ no, wɔde wɔn nsa guu wɔn so kaa sɛ:

Wɔ Yesu Kristo din mu mehyɛ wo ɔsɔfo (anaa sɛ sɛ ɔyɛ ɔkyerɛkyerɛni a, mehyɛ wo ɔkyerɛkyerɛni), mehyɛ wo ɔkyerɛkyerɛni, ama waka nsakyeraɛ ne bɔnefakyɛ a ɛnam Yesu Kristo so, na ɛnam apenee a wasi no wɔ gyedie mu wɔ ne din mu de akɔsi awieɛ. Amen.
Na saa kwan yi na wɔfaa so hyɛɛ asɔfoɔ ne akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, sɛdeɛ Onyankopɔn akyɛdeɛ ne ɔfrɛ a ɔde frɛ nnipa no teɛ; na wɔnam Honhom Kronkron tumi a ɛwɔ wɔn mu no so hyɛɛ wɔn asɔfoɔ ne akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ.
